name: Out of Bounds
description:
Originally started at a game jam, Out of Bounds is a short title about "creating" a game and "fixing" bugs.

You have 15 minutes to package your creation by compiling blueprints, shaders and testing sound effects. But watch out for the bugs! Grab your Line Tracer and get rid of them 💥🔫



Out of Bounds also features

  • Full controller support
  • Steam leaderboard
  • More than 30 Steam achievements
  • More than 70 languages
